>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.0yJjfyvWg5pDLcVR]

You take the listed amount of damage at the beginning of your turn each round until this condition ends.

Your bleeding can be stopped with a successful DC 15 Medicine check as a standard action, or through the application of any ability that restores Hit Points.

If you take two or more bleed effects, you take only the damage from the worst effect.
